## PBReflection.attribute() method

Gets the variable which is the vertex attribute of specified semantic

**Signature:**

```typescript
attribute(attrib: VertexSemantic): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  attrib | [VertexSemantic](doc/markdown/./device.vertexsemantic.md) | The vertex semantic |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
